steps: Choose the SoT you want from the Collection.
Use the filters to find the perfect SoT for you
Click on buy SoT and complete the payment with your credit card easily.
Congratulations! You are now an SoT owner
Make sure to add Polygon network to your Metamask wallet
Buy Matic from an exchange or swap from a DEFI protocol
Swap your Matic to DAI or ETH on polygon chain
Make sure your Wallet is connected to the Polygon Mainnet and Purchase your SoT!
